trans-unit.source: Provides data for a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per un evento annullabile.

trans-unit.source: A cancelable event is raised by a component when it is about to perform an action that can be canceled, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Un evento annullabile viene generato da un componente quando sta per eseguire un'azione che può essere annullata, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> evento di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event is deprecated and has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> evento è obsoleto ed è stato sostituito da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>.

trans-unit.source: It is offered as an example here only to illustrate the usage of <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Viene offerto come riportato di seguito solo per illustrare l'utilizzo di <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to indicate whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> fornisce la <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> proprietà per indicare se l'evento deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente usa <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler> per gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Closing> evento di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a class-level <xref:System.Boolean> variable named `isDataSaved`.
trans-unit.target: Questo codice presuppone che sia stato creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> con un livello di classe <xref:System.Boolean> variabile denominata `isDataSaved`.

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that you have added a statement to invoke the `OtherInitialize` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> method or the constructor (after the call to `InitializeComponent`).
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, presuppone che sia stata aggiunta un'istruzione per richiamare il `OtherInitialize` metodo del form <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> metodo o costruttore (dopo la chiamata a `InitializeComponent`).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> class with the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> property set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Consente di inizializzare una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> con la proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> impostata su <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cancel the event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per annullare l'evento; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> class with the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" /> property set to the given value.
trans-unit.target: Consente di inizializzare una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs" /> con la proprietà <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel" />impostata sul valore dato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se l'evento debba essere annullato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event should be canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'evento deve essere annullato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente usa <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventHandler> per gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> evento di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: This code assumes that you have created a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> with a class-level <xref:System.Boolean> variable named `isDataSaved`.
trans-unit.target: Questo codice presuppone che sia stato creato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> con un livello di classe <xref:System.Boolean> variabile denominata `isDataSaved`.

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that you have added a statement to invoke the `OtherInitialize` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> method or the constructor (after the call to `InitializeComponent`).
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, presuppone che sia stata aggiunta un'istruzione per richiamare il `OtherInitialize` metodo del form <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> metodo o costruttore (dopo la chiamata a `InitializeComponent`).
